front.title: QoS Resource Allocation in Mobile Networks with CASP

abstract.t: This document discusses QoS resource allocation in mobile networkswith Cross-Application Signaling Protocol [1].CASP separatessignaling message delivery from the discovery of the next suitableCASP node. When the discovery is done by scout messages, it mayintroduce considerable latency in the (re-)registration procedure inhandover cases. Therefore, advanced discovery mechanisms arerecommended.
